0.title: Log records received

1.title: metric records received

2.title: Log records refused

3.title: Metric records refused

5.title: Trace span Received

6.title: Trace records refused

8.title: Log records accepted by processor

9.title: Metric points accepted by processor

10.title: Spans accepted by processor

11.title: Log records dropped by processor

12.title: Metric points dropped by processor

13.title: Spans dropped by processor

14.title: Processor Batch size

15.title: Processor Batch timeout trigger

17.title: Log records sent by exporter

18.title: Metric point sent by exportert

19.title: Spans  send by exporter

21.title: Queue Percentage per Exporter
21.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_exporter_queue_size),capacity=avg(otelcol_exporter_queue_capacity), by:{exporter}
| fieldsAdd ratio=(total[]/capacity[])*100
| fieldsAdd ratiopermin=ratio[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total,capacity,ratio

23.title: CPU per min
23.query:
timeseries total=avg(otelcol_process_cpu_seconds)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

25.title: Total allocate bytes
25.query:
timeseries total=avg(
otelcol_process_runtime_total_alloc_bytes)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

26.title: System memory
26.query:
timeseries total=avg(
otelcol_process_runtime_total_sys_memory_bytes)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

27.title: memory allocated to process
27.query:
timeseries total=avg(
otelcol_process_memory_rss)
| fieldsAdd totalpers=total[]/todouble(interval/1m)
| fieldsRemove total

29.title: Cpu usage in millicores
29.query:
timeseries cpu_usages = avg(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage), by:{ k8s.workload.name, k8s.pod.name}
| fieldsAdd cpu_usage = cpu_usages[] 
|filter contains(k8s.workload.name,"-collector")
| fieldsRemove cpu_usages

31.title: Log records ration ( out/in)
31.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_log_records), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_log_records)
| fieldsAdd ration=sent[]/total[]
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

32.title: Metric point ration ( out/in)
32.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_metric_points), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_metric_points)
| fieldsAdd ration=sent[]/total[]
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

33.title: trace records ration ( out/in)
33.query:
timeseries total=sum(otelcol_receiver_accepted_spans), sent=sum(otelcol_exporter_sent_spans)
| fieldsAdd ration=sent[]/total[]
| fieldsAdd rationpers=ration[]/todouble(interval/1m) * 100
| fieldsRemove total,sent, ration

37.title: Type of collector deployment
37.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| fieldsAdd cloudApplicationDeploymentTypes
| fieldsAdd  belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace]
| fieldsAdd workload_label=cloudApplicationLabels
| filter workload_label[`app.kubernetes.io/component`] == "opentelemetry-collector"
| summarize count(), by:{toString(cloudApplicationDeploymentTypes) }

38.title: Numbe  of collectors
38.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| fieldsAdd workload_label=cloudApplicationLabels
| filter workload_label[`app.kubernetes.io/component`] == "opentelemetry-collector"
| summarize count()

39.title: Number of log lines ingested per min

41.title: Number of spans/min ingested

43.title: Cpu usage in millicores
43.query:
timeseries cpu_usages = avg(dt.kubernetes.container.cpu_usage), by:{ k8s.workload.name}
| fieldsAdd cpu_usage = cpu_usages[] 
|filter contains(k8s.workload.name,"targetallocator")
|fieldsRemove cpu_usages

45.title: Receiving time in milli seconds

47.title: Processing time in milli seconds

48.title: Receiver+ Processing time in milli seconds

50.query:
fetch logs 
| filter contains(k8s.pod.name,"otel")
| filter contains(content, "Partial success response")
| parse content, " BOS LD  SPACE+ LD 'Partial success response' LD 'data_type\":'  SPACE+ DQS:signal ',' LD 'message\":' SPACE+ DQS:error_message LD 'dropped' WORD '\":' SPACE+ INT:nbdropped  LD "
| filter nbdropped>0
| parse error_message, " LD ':'( SPACE+ LD:type ':' SPACE+ LD ':' SPACE+ SQS:name SPACE '-' SPACE 'Reason:' SPACE+ WORD:code )  "
| summarize count(), by:{name, type, code}

52.title: Number records dropped by OTLP ingest API
52.query:
fetch logs 
| filter contains(k8s.pod.name,"otel")
| filter contains(content, "Partial success response")
| parse content, " BOS LD  SPACE+ LD 'Partial success response' LD 'data_type\":'  SPACE+ DQS:signal ',' LD 'message\":' SPACE+ DQS:error_message LD 'dropped' WORD '\":' SPACE+ INT:nbdropped  LD "
| summarize records_dropped=sum(nbdropped), by:{bin(timestamp, 30s),signal}
